name: lifeout
description:
There are 2 friends who have come to find a horror hospital which is in the jungle due to some silly mistake jak tapped in the hospital and now he has to find a way out of the hospital.

The game will include a linear storyline with puzzles.

It is an enclosed environment, horror-style game which is set in a jungle,

along with keyboard/mouse controls, different UI panels.

  • Find the room where is the key of main door
  • There are 4 lock doors in this game
  • There is timer also in the game
  • There is mini map in game
  • There are no hints in the game
